channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Yammer for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Yammer for Android

item.title: CVE-2019-1265|2024-08-04T18:13:29.544Z -- microsoft -- yammer%20for%20android
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists when Microsoft Yammer App for Android fails to apply the correct Intune MAM Policy.This could allow an attacker to perform functions that are restricted by Intune Policy.The security update addresses the vulnerability by correcting the way the policy is applied to Yammer App., aka 'Microsoft Yammer Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.
